column4: hey, im brand new to linux, using ubuntu 10.4.  I am trying to get my sony hd cam working, it picks it up in 'WebcamStudio' but i cant seem to get it to be recognized by any msgr programs or flash sites.  even when i run webcam studio. am i missing something?
emesene and skype not detecting your cam?
no, they will pick up my built in cam, chicony but, not my external, which is what i need to use, the built in cam is crap =/
